mapper.select: SELECT A.seq as boardId, company, title, reg_id as regId, reg_date as regDate, content, B.org_name as orgName FROM DW_BOARD A LEFT OUTER JOIN board_files B ON A.file_id = B.seq
mapper.insert: insert into DW_BOARD(company, title, file_id, reg_id, reg_date, content) values (#{company}, #{title}, #{fileId}, #{regId}, NOW(), #{content});
mapper.select: SELECT A.seq as boardId, company, title, reg_id as regId, reg_date as regDate, content, B.org_name as orgName FROM DW_BOARD A LEFT OUTER JOIN board_files B ON A.file_id = B.seq WHERE A.seq = #{boardId}
